  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: KSLawdogg@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yah=
oogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, April 21, 2001 7:15 PM
  Subject: Out of th=
e Fire - Kane


  (Delay caused by having to get phone line from online-obs=
essed brother.  Also 
  mass school project.  Typing fast, don't have much =
time)

  The Protectobots/The Oblitercons/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw=
/Nemesis
  Enforcer/Scattershot/Imprisoner/Predator/Choran/Shockwave/Unitro=
n/Firestarter/
  Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Vehement/Reflector/
  Serp=
entor:



  Demon Wulf watched a two missiles head for and watched them blo=
w up after 
  firing four optic blasts at them, two for one.  He raised his=
 sword, firing 
  off a missile at the Cybertronian Fire.

  "Brothers, the=
 ranks of those seiging this installation of Cybertronian scum 
  are thinn=
ing.  We must take leave." he said, powering up his engines to full 
  powe=
r.

  ---

  Flesh Ripper yelled out as teeth sunk into his face.  He spun =
so Demise's 
  back would face the incoming twenty-five laser bolts.  Flesh=
 Ripper powered 
  up the boosters in his feet to make it so he wouldn't ch=
ange directions very 
  easy.

  At the same time he fired off ten rapid op=
tic blasts at Demise's left optic, 
  which was rather close.

  ---

  Dar=
k Claw avoided twenty of the shots fired at him, the rest doing little 
  d=
amage.  Two black orbs formed in his hands, each with the power of a charge=
. 
  He threw one orb of energy at the CF, the other at Iron Raptor, this o=
rb 
  having a seeking ability.

  ---

  Dark One was done with Hiss, who =
wasn't out of stasis lock, but wouldn't die 
  when this battle ended.  If =
undisturbed.  The Oblitercon commander looked to 
  Breakdown.  He ran over=
 to him.  "You alright?"

  ---

  Breakdown lifted his head up rather pain=
fully, and nodded to his commander's 
  question.  "Kind of." wtih that, he=
 went into stasis lock, and Dark One began 
  repairs on him.  But to bring=
 him into fighting condition.

  ---

  Pyro laid on the ground, imagining =
a beautiful burning forest to take his 
  mind off the incredible pains in =
his body.

  ---

  Hiss, though in a stable condition, remained out of it.=


  ---

  Scavenger same as above.  (told you I was tapped for time...)

 =
 ---

  Hot Spot yelled out as a sword dug into his side, and collapsed, cu=
rsing 
  Headstrong before he slammed to his chest.

  ---

  Groove was st=
ruck with a blast from Abominous, sending him flipping back and 
  crashing=
 down, a large gaping hole in his side.  He decided not to commit 
  suicid=
e and didn't fire on the gestalt.

  ---

  Blades tried to avoid a blast f=
rom Abominous, but was struck and sent 
  flinging downwards.

  ---

  Fir=
st Aid still only gave Firedrill a look of confusion.  "Do I know you?" he =

  asked, repeating his question.

  ---

  Streetwise painfully began to g=
et up, and noticed Decepticons were fleeing.  
  "We--OW!" he yelled, damag=
ed circuitry flaring with pain, the Maximal 
  collapsing.

  ---


  Impri=
soner felt EndBringer wrap his tentacles around the cannon that had only 
 =
 moments ago fired upon him with rapid laser bolts.  Electricity surged 
  =
through Imprisoner from EndBringer.  A yell of pain came from Imprisoner's =

  form, but nothing was badly damaged because of the rubber treads of the =

  attack vehicle mode that acted like conductors.

  One cannon swiveled t=
o point at EndBringer, firing two energy-signature 
  seeking missiles at t=
he Predacon.  It would no doubt damage Imprisoner as 
  well, but he notice=
d the Decepticons were treating and he didn't want to be 
  fighting all th=
ese baddies by himself.

  ---

  Predator jumped hard left, transforming i=
nto his tiger mode and avoiding all 
  three missiles, though shrapnel dug =
into his tail.  Quickly transforming back 
  to biped mode, missile launche=
r in hand, he fired off two rockets.  One 
  headed for Firearm, the other =
headed for the Cybertronian Fire.

  ---

  Choran felt three laser bolts s=
trike him and he took a step back, three dents 
  in his chest.  "Piece o' =
slag..." he raised his rifle, firing twenty-five 
  laser bolts in an arc.
=

  Ten rapid shots headed for Fliq, six for Atilla, and nine for Grimmler.
=

  ---

  Shockwave transformed to biped mode, weapons fire passing by him =
harmlessly 
  because of the decrease of size.  He transformed to his weapo=
n mode, which 
  was roughly the same size as him in biped mode.

  He fire=
d a long X-ray blast at Incarcinator that would strike in a 20ft 
  radius =
with Incarcinator in the center.  (Damages internally)

  ---

  Unitron's =
sensors detected two incoming missiles being destroyed, thanks to a 
  smal=
l thing Unitron had no idea about (Beeline).  He fired off a seeking 
  mis=
sile at an incoming missile, causing it to blow up.

  He fired on energy-s=
ignature seeking missile at Zardus.  Numerous rapid 
  firing weapons struc=
k Unitron and he transformed to his biped mode.  In space 
  fighter mode h=
e wouldn't have survived.  He let out a slight yell and looked 
  to the re=
treating Decepticons.

  "Cowards..." he muttered, ignoring the fact that m=
ost of the attackers on the 
  CF were slowly beginning to retreat, himself=
 included.  He fired off ten 
  rapid optic blasts at Hot Rod's left knee j=
oint.

  ---

  Firestarter let out a yell and launched two flares which ex=
ploded and blocked 
  all weapons fire heading for him.  He armed two missi=
les, launching them at 
  Iron Raptor.

  "Burn in hell, Maximal scum."

  =
---

  Scattershot flew higher and higher, holding a large bomb.  He planne=
d on 
  "accidentally" dropping it on the Maximals.  He burst into evil lau=
ghter at 
  the thought, dropping it down towards an NDE member and a fight=
ing Alliance 
  member.

  "Works either wa--OH MY GENTILE JESUS!" he screa=
med, his optics enhancing and 
  he now learned he had dropped the bomb dow=
n towards Nemesis Enforcer and 
  Serpentor.

  "Good job, Zardus!" he yell=
ed, looking around nervously.

  ---

  Double Punch was struck with all th=
ree charges, his exo-skeleton almost 
  giving away.  Crashing to the groun=
d he let out a small whine.  Getting up 
  slowly, his modifications were c=
omplete.  He painfully raised his tail, 
  seeing the outline of Scyther.  =
He fired a smal spray of acid at the outline.

  ---

  Injector took an ai=
m with both launchers at the unsuspecting Dark One and 
  downed Breakdown,=
 but a dozen shots struck him and knocked him back.

  "Pieces of slag!" he=
 yelled at the site of his cracked exo-skeleton.  He 
  raised his left arm=
, firing off two stinger missiles SharpClaws and two from 
  the other at U=
nderground.

  ---

  Manterror hit the ground after shots impacted with hi=
m.  He let out a yell of 
  rage as he jumped to his feet.

  ---

  Veheme=
nt looked to one missile, firing off two optic blasts at it, and turned 
  =
to the other, firing off two rapid optic blasts at it, seeing from the corn=
er 
  of his optics their explosions.

  He raised his left arm, firing two=
 missiles at Hot Rod, and from the other 
  firing two missiles at the Cybe=
rtronian Fire.  Twenty five shots struck 
  Vehement dead on and sent him f=
lying out of control downward.

  ---

  Reflector raised both arms, firing=
 two missiles each that prematurely 
  exploded and took out all shots head=
ing for him.  He couldn't see through the 
  flames of his resulting defens=
e, and so waited until he could see a target to 
  attack.

  ---

  Serpen=
tor had gotten the upperhand and continued to pummel Nemesis' face 
  until=
 he heard a faint whistling sound.  Looking up he saw an object about 
  th=
e size of three charges.  "Right..." he said, jumping back and transforming=
 
  to his snake mode and slithering away, noticing the slow retreat.

  --=
-

  The bomb struck a few feet away from Nemesis Enforcer, sending him fly=
ing 
  through the air without the use of his engines or wings, his body bu=
rned and 
  scarred, the robot himself screaming.
